segments.text: Sandy , I think we made a mistake ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a cute little teddy bear !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How sweet ! Maybe he was just a shy guy who had a crush on you !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And look what we did to him ! Hey ... he left me his business card .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow ! Call him tonight ! You guys will really have an interesting love story to tell everyone !
segments.speaker: S1
